article: Every reader of this passage must spend the whole of his waking life looking at things . Looking , like breathing , is natural ; we do it without noticing it . Looking is passive - - but seeing is active . Once you start seeing things you really begin to wake up . People who see things which others have only looked at , and draw conclusions from what they see , can add to man ' s knowledge and help progress . Someone recently discovered a place where metal had been worked continuously longer than any where else in prefix = st1 / England . He " saw " a wall in theForestofDean . Thousands of people must have looked at it without really seeing it , but this man noticed that among the usual stones of that place were bits and pieces of a different color1 ; they also felt different to the hand . A closer sight showed that these pieces had been left behind in the fires of ancient people who had melted rocks to get metals . Looking around , he found more and more information , until the history of what men had done at that place over tens of centuries was known .

model: looking at things that are active
